channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle and the Teacher. Preschool comedy drama series. Evie's new school teacher comes for a home visit, but Waffle is teething and won't stop chewing everything in sight.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Spiky Sitting. When double act Phoenix and Mossy find Spiky far away from his burrows, they decide to take him home. Poor wee fella, he's so small and helpless. or is he.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Look for Clues. Space, blue wool and a special label - three clues to help JoJo find the owner of a precious toy. JoJo and Gran Gran are detectives on the case of the lost teddy.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: The Surprising Carrot. Pepi Nana finds a plate of toy carrots on the table in the Toy House, and Mr Onion shares a book about carrots with Dibillo.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Holes. Stop-motion animation. Tiny and Small find a box that has fallen from space. It contains two circles of black cloth that are actually holes, one leading to another.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: What Loud Music, Tombliboos! Children's programme. The Tombliboos play music very loudly, and Makka Pakka has to use his trumpet through Upsy Daisy's megaphone to be heard.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Natalie Dormer - Love Monster and the Scary Something. An exciting story read by a special guest. Natalie Dormer reads Love Monster and the Scary Something, by Rachel Bright.[(96057)]
